subject: Television
lead_paragraph: A quick impression from watching the debut of ESPN’s “E:60” news magazine on Tuesday is how much the show wants to emulate the gravitas of HBO’s 12-year-old “Real Sports.”
snippet: A quick impression from watching the debut of ESPN’s “E:60” news magazine on Tuesday is how much the show wants to emulate the gravitas of HBO’s 12-year-old “Real Sports.”
